name: Don't Touch Me : Zombie Survival

minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 1748 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
